original_text: So Lot chose for himself all the Jordan Valley, and Lot journeyed east. Thus they separated from each other.
korean_text: 그러므로 롯이 요단 온 지역을 택하고 동으로 옮기니 그들이 서로 떠난지라

sentences.original_text: So Lot chose for himself all the Jordan Valley
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 롯은 요단 온 평야를 택했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Thus they separated from each other.
